comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: "PARIS, Feb. 15. [1913] -- Throughout the length and breadth of the country all classes of the French nation are preparing a joyous celebration of Poincare Day, and it is universally felt that Feb. 18 when "the people's President" takes up his office, will mark a new start in French history." (more) -- New York Times Please note typo: spelling of last name ought be "Poincare" rather than "Poincaire".
